message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I see the "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section which has three line items:
- Beginning Balance: 20000000.00
- Ending Balance: 2582632.85
- Net Increase: -17417367.15

The "Beginning Balance" represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period, which is 20000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '20000000.00'} }
```
